name: Samurai
description: Samurai draw on an implacable fighting spirit to overcome enemies.

3.name: Bonus Proficiency
3.description: Gain proficiency in one skill or one language of your choice.

3.name: Fighting Spirit
3.description: As a bonus action, gain advantage on weapon attacks until end of turn and temporary hit points, usable three times per long rest.

7.name: Elegant Courtier
7.description: Add your Wisdom modifier to Persuasion checks and gain proficiency in Wisdom saves or another save.

10.name: Tireless Spirit
10.description: Regain one use of Fighting Spirit when you roll initiative and have none.

15.name: Rapid Strike
15.description: Forgo advantage on an attack to make an additional weapon attack against the same target.

18.name: Strength before Death
18.description: Use your reaction to take an extra turn when reduced to 0 hit points, before falling unconscious.
